text.text_translated:
Your dreams can show thoughts you did not know you had.  

Common dreams are flying, falling, losing teeth, or being naked in public.  

Many people think these dreams mean similar things.  

To understand a dream, link it to events, feelings in daily life.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Your dreams can show ideas you did not know you thought about.  

Common dreams are flying, falling, losing teeth, or naked in public.  

Many people think these dreams mean similar things.  

To understand a dream, link it to events in your daily life.  

Also link it to your feelings.
